name: Scratch
body:
### What is Scratch?
**Scratch** is an extremely lightweight [WordPress](wordpress.com) theme designed for minimalist bloggers.

### Why Scratch?
I created Scratch after tirelessly searching the Internet for a super-thin WordPress theme—to no avail.

### Intentional Frills
With Scratch, you can focus on writing and publishing interesting content in an easy-to-read format.

### Authors and Contributors
@AdamLawicki authored Scratch in February 2016. It is built on Bootstrap (thanks to @mdo and @fat), and @taniarascia's Start WordPress article.

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with Scratch? Check out our [documentation](https://adamlawicki.github.com/scratch) or [contact Adam](https://twitter.com/itslawicki) and we’ll help you sort it out.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
